/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -ccbin /usr/bin/c++   --expt-extended-lambda -O3 -DNDEBUG      CMakeFiles/kripke.exe.dir/src/kripke.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kripke.exe.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o bin/kripke.exe -Xcompiler \"-Wl,-rpath,/home/shixing/.openmpi/lib,lib/libRAJA.a,/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a\" -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so /home/shixing/.openmpi/lib/libmpi.so lib/libkripke.a lib/libRAJA.a /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so /home/shixing/.openmpi/lib/libmpi.so
